I *LOVE* Casa de la Pradera.  A small whole in the wall, La Pradera is one of those places that you wish you would have known about forever...!  In fact, though, this sweet spot isn't that old.  Nevertheless, the decor is vintage, interesting, and overall, cool!  Indeed, I say cool because this bar draw draws all the cool hip young kids from big bad BCN.  They come for the great drinks but, I think, most of all because of the fabulous music.  A live DJ is there (at least on the weekend nights I've been), pumping out some pretty darned good alternative/electro music.  Really, I don't have a lot of negative things to say about this place.  It's absolutely *fabulous*!  A must-visit if you're in lower Raval with some time on your hands and an itch to have fun :)
